Key Match Events: The Mets lost 6-0 to the Brewers
Jose Quintana's scoreless streak was snapped in the fourth inning
The Brewers scored twice in the fourth inning
Pre-Game Insights: The Mets needed a win to secure a playoff spot
Post-Match Reflections: Pete Alonso expressed concern about the team's performance
Carlos Mendoza emphasized the importance of winning and playing better
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Mets are 0-5 against the Brewers this season
The Mets own a tiebreaker with Arizona based on winning the season series
Others: The Mets managed just two hits against six pitchers
The Brewers are locked into the No. 3 seed for the postseason
